caption.p: Allelopathic inhibitory effect of various concentrations of the MeOH extracts of the aerial parts of Heliotropium curassavicum collected from coastal and inland habitats on ( a) the germination, ( b) root, and ( c) shoot growth of Bidens pilosa. Different letters within each measurement mean values of significant variation at p â‰¤ 0.05. IC 50 is the concentration extract required for 50% inhibition.
